item.description:
Last Call for RSVPS as we finalize the Scoreboard Reservation and the Birthday Cake Order. Please Update your RSVPs.

The Red Sox Natives are 5 years old!

Five years ago Natives Founder Jon Mason had a brilliant idea and formed this group. And here we are today approaching our 700th Meetup!

Please join us at The Scoreboard in Woburn at 1:00pm on Sunday, April 7 2013 to celebrate the Red Sox Natives story.

We will have a reserved section and table.

Stay for lunch, drinks, socializing and cake.

Watch the Red Sox play the Toronto Blue Jays with a 1:07pm Game Time.  

There will be a Birthday Cake served during the 7th inning! 

All Red Sox Natives, Legacy Members, Organizers and Event Hosts are invited. Please RSVP to facilitate the Scoreboard lunch table reservation and birthday cake order if you wish to have a seat. We will not be cross posting this event. Please wear your Red Sox apparel. 

Please remember to maintain your own tab or pay as you order and tip your servers Scoreboard staff will take credit cards and there will be no group bill. Everyone is responsible for their own food and drinks.

The Red Sox Natives have been organizing Sports viewing parties over the last several years with guests from several other invited groups attending. We have had a blast with up to 80 people attending at various locations in Boston, Woburn and Wakefield.

Scoreboard has been one of our venues for watching Patriots, Red Sox, Bruins and Celtics games over the past several years.

If you have never been to Scoreboard it is located at 15 Middlesex Canal Park next to the Hotel and Showcase Cinema off Route 128 in Woburn. Scoreboard has over 50 high definition and plasma TVs ranging in size from 50 to 92 inches. Parking is free. More info at http://www.tpsscoreboard.com

 

We hope to see you there!

Jon, Frank and The Red Sox Natives team
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess or Amanda for the location of the Red Sox Natives Reserved Section
item.name: Red Sox Natives 5 Year Birthday Bash and Game Viewing Red Sox vs Blue Jays Game
